question: Who of the following declared that Chittagong, Dhaka and Mymensingh would be merged with Assam?
explanation: In the year 1903, Frazer (Lieutenant Governor of Bengal) proposed a fresh notice of partition of Bengal. After that Harbart Rijli (The then Home Secretary to Government of India) declared that Chittagong, Dhaka and Mymensingh would be merged with Assam.
